programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivies newly-built sandcastle is accidentally destroyed, Barney offers to help her rebuild it using a little magic, but Vivie wants to do it all by herself.Together, they enjoy the process of constructing a new sandcastle from scratch.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: After Vivie reads a sad story with her Nonna, Barney helps her embrace that its okay to be sad sometimes. After feeling OK sitting in her sadness for a bit, Vivie comes up with a happy ending for the story.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to embrace and use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage if hes going to put a stop to Pranks latest scheme.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, shes a peasant who grows carrots. And the Twins are now the castle guards, protecting the residence of the King… who happens to be none other than Lewis! But worse still, the rabbit doesnt even recognize Alice; in fact, he thinks shes an intruder who must be chased out of the kingdom and whose key must be confiscated! Could Wonderland be becoming a nightmarish kingdom thats anything but wonderful?!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: In this special two-part episode, Alice finds Wonderland in a very odd state! The Queen is no longer queen: instead, shes a peasant who grows carrots. And the Twins are now the castle guards, protecting the residence of the King… who happens to be none other than Lewis! But worse still, the rabbit doesnt even recognize Alice; in fact, he thinks shes an intruder who must be chased out of the kingdom and whose key must be confiscated! Could Wonderland be becoming a nightmarish kingdom thats anything but wonderful?!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of the preparations for the Duchess surprise birthday party for nephew Rupert and Jerry is determined to make a mess of it all.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work together to save a live turkey from becoming the centerpiece of a holiday feast.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory./ Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. / After a particularly destructive chase Tom and Spike have to go to the vet./ Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches spell before sundown. / Tom kicks Spikes beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence./ Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing their customers.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a spooky castle on the hill. The Docs, hot on Lamputs heels, find an unattended broomstick, and, typically, their first instinct is to use it to try to squish their orange quarry. But they quickly discover the broomstick has other, way cooler, uses. Before long the Docs are engaged in some high-speed, unlicenced magical broomstick-riding. Luckily for Lamput, the castles owner steps in. Shes green and witchy, and pretty annoyed about being disturbed from her moonbaking. When the docs break her magical broom, she flies into full witch-mode. Everyone gets transformed into frogs. Which, for Lamput, is a normal day at the office.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates… a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a return match. He decides to build his own racing machine to challenge the Lemmings soapbox.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs prove their inventing skills by coming up with an age-altering time-ray. This breakthrough could change the world. If they used it for something other than chasing Lamput. Obsessed much, fellas? Wildly shooting their time-ray off in public causes a not-unsurprising amount of chaos, until the local law enforcement gets caught in the cross-fire. Looks like the Specs and Skinny are gonna be in jail till they get old the normal way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels zoom into action when the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around when Green Arrow and his Arrowplane Goldie come to help Batman take on Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Prince Lionel of England hires The Looney Builders to build him a party room for his birthday, then proceeds to boss the crew around. / Our heroes set off on adventure… on a cruise ship! / Marina gives the pilot a crash course in navigation. / Zig finds a book about African wildlife and realises thats where he actually comes from. He decides to go there and meet his compatriots. / Will Deep-sea diver Barbara bring Bernie back to the surface? / While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. / The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. / The Bear is preparing to go on a world trip but a last minute accident makes him panic. / Masha is tired of music lessons and she decides she can perform without the tedious learning of notes and goes for a walk with the "Bremen Town Musicians" in fairytale Germany. / A new friend got lost in the forest. Masha acts like a real Robin Hood. She wants to help this lost soul to return home. Meanwhile, the Wolves are trying to get to our guest. / This is a very long car ride! What fun things can we look for out the window that will make the time go faster? / Tom and Jerry mistake burglars loot for a bag of donuts.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef. / Sharko has a secret dream… he wants to do a water ballet! / Zig befriends a Yeti who helps him get closer to the mermaid… / Marina and Sharko go on holiday… to a campsite. Marina is disappointed: she would have preferred a five-star hotel. Guess who their neighbours are? Zig and Bernie! / Bernie wanders off into an amusement park… / Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. / The Lemmings slide along the Great Wall in a crate. / An unexpected guest whirled Masha and everyone who met on her way in a dance. She made Bear remember his youth and disturbed the calmness of the She-Bear. Who is this stranger? / When we crave for adventures and new experiences, we take sleeping bags and a tent and go camping. We will admire amazing landscapes, climb a mountain and even see real volcanoes! / Masha decides celebrating New Year once is not enough and goes to mysterious China, where dragons dance, gardens bloom and many, many more interesting things are happening! / Its the perfect day to go on a Summer field trip! JJ and friends are having fun with sea animals at the beach. Sing along with us! / A health inspector calls on the Hotel; Tom and Jerry go to a mini-golf park; a swan befriends Jerry; Spike fancies himself a Canine King.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken. / Sharko misses the ocean. So when to boat crashes and sinks under the sea hes delighted! / Marina is fascinated by train models. Zig and Bernie turn up with a miniature train that actually works. Marina climbs aboard with Sharko, who bars Zig and Bernie from the trip. / Sharko cant emerge from a recurring pie-in-the-face dream. / How did Bernie end up on the sea floor in the first place? / Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. / The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. / Masha tries to comprehend the centuries-old wisdom and sets off in search of enlightenment in the magical land of India, where she will find many new experiences and discoveries. / Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! / To cure her beloved assistant, Masha goes to a mysterious and amazing eastern country. But the answers to the most difficult questions are simpler than they seem at first glance. / The little ducklings are learning the safe way to cross the street today! Join in and sing along! / Tom has a nightmare about a super-intelligent mouse takeover. Jerry inherits a hamster ball. A chase through NYC turns into a musical tribute.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hangout in the forest, she is rapt… and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a forest song, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it.

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.
