programme.title: Siil Sonic
programme.desc: Vaike sinine superenergiapall Sonic satub maale, sest peab oma planeedi paastmiseks peidus elama. Tema kõige tahtsam ulesanne on mitte aratada tahelepanu. Kuid sellist supervõimet nagu Sonicul, on võimatu kaua varjata, eriti kui sa oled ulienergiline ja vallatu teismeline, kes uldse ei armasta uksildust. Kui Sonicule jõuab jalile vastik kuri geenius doktor Robotnik koos oma leiutiste armeega, algab meeletu tagaajamine. Õnneks asub supersiilile appi kohalik politsenik Tom Wachowski. Koos tuleb neil uletada hulgaliselt raskusi (ja mis seal salata, ka kiirust) paastmaks maailm Robotniku ulemvõimu eest, mille eelduseks on Sonicu energiaallikas.

programme.title: Alvin ja koopaoravad 2
programme.desc: USA 2009 animafilm Lavastaja: Betty Thomas Osades (haaled): Anatoli Tafitðuk, Maarius Parn, Veiko Anvelt, Merilin Kirbits, Mairi Jõgi, Natali Lohk, Priit Võigemast, Tiit Sukk, Taavi Teplenkov, Rasmus Kaljujarv Kolm muhedat karvast venda on tagasi! Koopaoravad Alvin, Simon ja Theodore. Parast jarjekordset apardust, millesse olid segatud Alvin ja nende heliloojast hooldaja Dave Seville (Jason Lee), peab musikaalne kolmik kolima Davei laheda sugulase Toby juurde. Ja sarnaselt inimlastega hakkavad nad seal kohalikus koolis kaima. Kool toob endaga noorte rokkstaaride jaoks kaasa hulga uusi valjakutseid nagu kodused ulesanded, kehalise kasvatuse tunnid ning loomulikult… tudrukud! Ehk siis oravaplikadest trio, kes tegelevad ka laulmisega ja seda Alvini ning vendade endise ahne manedzheri Ian Hawkei (David Cross) kae all, kes on lubanud teha neist tudrukutest kõige suuremad staarid maailma muusikaturul.

programme.title: Alvin ja koopaoravad 3
programme.desc: USA 2011 animafilm Lavastaja: Mike Mitchell Vallatu koopaorav Alvin on koos oma vendade ning vahvate oravaplikadega ansamblist Orvetid puhkusereisil, mille kaigus muudavad nad luksusliku kruiisilaeva oma isiklikuks manguvaljakuks. Parast suurt apardust leiavad oravad end aga korraga omapead uksikult saarelt. Ettevõtlikud loomakesed ei kavatse olukorraga leppida ning proovivad jargemooda erinevaid kavalaid plaane, kuidas sealt paaseda. Seda tehes avastavad nad kogemata, et nad polegi sel saarel nii omapead kui alguses tundus...

programme.title: Baleriin
programme.desc: USA 2017 animatsioon. EESTI KEELES! Felicie on Bretagneist parit noor orb, kel on vaid uks kirg - tantsimine. Ühes parima sõbra Victoriga, kes ihkab suureks leiutajaks saada, kavandab ta poorase põgenemise orbudekodust Valguse linna Pariisi, kus Eiffeli torni alles ehitatakse! Felicie peab nagema vaeva, nagu ei iial varem, end uletama ja õppima vigadest, kui tahab teha teoks oma metsikuima unistuse ja saada Pariisi ooperiteatris priimabaleriiniks. Lavastaja: Eric Summer, Eric Warin Osades: Mirtel Pohla, Mart Muurisepp, Mart Pius, Eduard Toman,Age Oks jt.

programme.title: Kiired ja vihased 5
programme.desc: USA / Brasiilia / Jaapan 2011 marul Lavastaja:Justin Lin Osades:Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson Alates sellest ajast, kui Brian OConner (Paul Walker) ja Mia (Jordana Brewster) tudruku venna Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) vangistusest vabastasid, on nad põgenenud ule mitme riigipiiri, et paaseda võimude kaest. Nuud on nad aetud nurka Rio de Janeiros, kus peavad ette võtma veel uhe toootsa, et lunastada oma vabadus. Nad panevad tippautojuhtidest kokku seninagematu meeskonna, mille liikmete uhiseks vaenlaseks on nende surma sooviv rapane arimees. Ent see pole ainus, kes neil kannul on.Karm foderaalagent Luke Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) tabab alati marki. Kui ta saab ulesande puuda kinni Dom ja Brian, alustab ta oma loogiruhmaga laiaulatuslikku runnakut. Ent kui tema mehed labi Brasiilia kihutavad, saab Hobbs aegamooda aru, et headel ja pahadel poistel ei ole sealkandis kuigi kerge vahet teha. Nuud peab ta usaldama oma vaistu, et saak kinni puuda, enne kui keegi nad lihtsalt laiaks litsub...

programme.title: Toovari 2
programme.desc: USA 2016 marulikomoodia. Ben Barber (Kevin Hart) valmistub abielluma oma pruudi Angelaga (Tika Sumpter), kes on ta kolleegist politseiniku Jamesi (Ice Cube) õde. Politseinikud saadetakse Miamisse, et nad uuriks halastamatut narkodiilerit Antonio Popei (Benjamin Bratt), kes varustab uimastitega tervet Miamit. Nendega liitub asjalik uurija Maya (Olivia Munn) ja nad siirduvad koos Popei arile lõppu tegema. Pingeid tõstab veelgi Beni ja Angela lahenev pulm. Lavastaja:Tim Story Osades:Ice Cube, Kevin Hart, Ken Jeong, Olivia Munn, Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Olen number neli
programme.desc: USA 2011 ulmethrillerLavastaja: D.J. CarusoOsades: Alex Pettyfer, Timothy Olyphant, Dianna Agron, Kevin Durand, Teresa Palmer, Callan McAuliffeKolm on surnud. Aga kes on number neli? John Smith (Alex Pettyfer) on noor põgenik, kes puuab paaseda teda havitama saadetud halastamatute vaenlaste eest. Muutes pidevalt oma identiteeti, kolides linnast linna koos oma kaitsja Henriga (Timothy Olyphant), on John alati uus poiss, kel pole mingisugust sidet oma minevikuga. Ühes Ohio vaikelinnas, mida ta nuud koduks nimetab, tabab Johni elu esimene armastus (Dianna Agron), ta avastab endas uued ullatavad võimed ning leiab sideme nendega, kes jagavad ta erakordset saatust.

programme.title: Creed III
programme.desc: Parast poksimaailmas domineerimist on Adonis Creed olnud edukas nii karjaaris kui ka pereelus. Kui lapsepõlvesõber ja endine poksi imelaps Damian (Jonathan Majors) parast pika vanglakaristuse kandmist uuesti valja ilmub, soovib ta innukalt tõestada, et vaarib uut võimalust poksiringis. Endiste sõprade vaheline vastasseis on aga enamat kui lihtsalt poksimatš. Arvete klaarimiseks peab Adonis oma tuleviku kaalule panema, et võidelda Damianiga – võitlejaga, kel pole midagi kaotada.

programme.title: Mantliparija
programme.desc: Noor Donald Trump (Sebastian Stan,) on 1970ndate New Yorgis jõuka perekonna vanuselt teine poeg, kes ihkab endale nime teha. Ta satub kõrilõikajast advokaadi Roy Cohni (Jeremy Strong) mõju alla, kes aitab luua tanapaeval tuntud Donald Trumpi. Cohn naeb Trumpis taiuslikku protežeed, kel on toores auahnus, edujanu ja tahe võitmiseks kõike teha.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Põnev ja seksikas krimisari briljantse mõistusega kriminaalkaitse professorist ja grupist ambitsioonikatest tudengitest. See seltskond ei oska arvatagi, et loengutes õpitut peavad nad usna varsti pariselt rakendama, sest ootamatult kistakse nad mõrvamusteeriumi, mis raputab kogu ulikooli ja muudab nende elusid

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise seisab silmitsi ettenagematu probleemiga parast seda, kui Laureli abistamise juhtumis selguvad olulise tunnistaja kohta kahjulikud uksikasjad. "K4" jatkab samal ajal oma pingutusi Annalise kollektiivse hagi jaoks juhtumi ettevalmistamisel.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Kui kaalukausil on Annalisei kollektiivhagi, osutub kohtumine maineka Washington DC asjaajaja Olivia Popeiga hadavajalikuks, et saada võimalust kaasust riigi kõrgeimale kohtule esitada. Bonnie avastab aga Simoni kohta murettekitavat teavet.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise aitab "Keating 4-l" koostada plaani, et valmistuda jargmiseks kusitluste laineks parast seda, kui uurijad Simoni juhtumis labimurde saavutavad. Laurel avastab aga Wesi surmaoo kohta uusi asjaolusid, mis viivad ullatava kohtumiseni.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Põnev ja seksikas krimisari briljantse mõistusega kriminaalkaitse professorist ja grupist ambitsioonikatest tudengitest. programme.title: Alvin ja koopaoravad 4
programme.desc: USA 2015 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Walt Becker Osades:Jason Lee, Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler Alvin, Simon ja Theodore on kolm venda, muusikamaailma staarid, kes on uhtlasi koopaoravad. Nagu paljud teismelised liigist sõltumata, meeldib ka neile seigelda ja nagu paljudel teistel poistel, toob seiklemine sageli kaasa suuremaid ja vaiksemaid pahandusi. Nii ka seekord. Üks arusaamatus jargneb teisele ja nii arvavadki karvased vennakesed, et nende peremees/kasuisa Dave (Jason Lee) kavatseb oma uue pruudi endale naiseks paluda ja, oh õudust!, koopaoravad tagasi metsa ajada!

programme.title: Mees, kes tõusis jalule
programme.desc: Tõestisundinud lugu vaidetavalt labipõlenud poksijast James J. Braddockist, kes naasis tahelepanu keskpunkti, et võita raskekaalu maailmameistritiitel.

programme.title: Valge lind
programme.desc: Bestselleri "Ime" autori uuel inspireerival raamatul "Valge lind: lugu imest" põhinev samanimeline film raagib jargmise peatukina loo Julianist (Bryce Gheisar), kellel on raskusi kohanemisega parast seda, kui ta koolist Auggie Pullmani kohtlemise tõttu valja visati.

programme.title: Kiired ja vihased 6
programme.desc: USA / Jaapan / Hispaania / Suurbritannia 2013 marul Lavastaja:Justin Lin Osades:Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson Parast Domi ja Briani Rio roovi, mis purustas uhe mafiooso impeeriumi ning tõi nende tiimile sisse sada miljonit dollarit, on nad ule maailma laiali pudenenud. Kuna nad ei või tagasi koju minna, on nende eludes tuhimik. Vahepeal on aga Hobbs jalitanud palgamõrtsukatest autojuhtide organisatsiooni, mis tegutseb 12 riigis. Nende liidri jõhkraks paremaks kaeks on Letty, Domi kunagine kallim, keda ta surnuks pidas. Ainus viis selle kriminaalse jõugu peatamiseks on neid tanavatel võita, seega palub Hobbs Domil oma eliittiim Londonisse koondada. Millise tasu eest? Nad kõik vabastatakse suudistustest ja nad võivad koju naasta, et taas oma peredega liituda.

programme.title: Monki viimane juhtum
programme.desc: Obsessiiv-kompulsiivse hairega geniaalne detektiiv Monk naaseb, et lahendada kõige viimane juhtum, mis puudutab tema kasututart Mollyt, pulmadeks valmistuvat ajakirjanikku.

programme.title: Asterix
programme.desc: Prantsusmaa / Belgia 2018 animakomoodia Lavastaja:Alexandre Astier, Louis Clichy Osades (haaled):Tarvo Krall, Eduard Toman, Tõnu Oja, Priit Öovel, Toomas Krall, Tauno Hints, Kristi Aule, Andrus Kasesalu, Erki Peinar ja Jane Meresmaa Roos Druiid Panoramix ronib puuvõõrikuid korjates vilkalt ja valedalt mooda alistamatute gallide kula umbritsevate tammede tuvesid. Ühel õnnetul paeval kukub osavkapp aga õnnetult puu otsast maha. Ja oi, kuidas see ta muretsema paneb! Mis kõik võib juhtuda, kui ta end vigastab ja ei saa enam võlujooke keeta?Koos Asterixi ja Obelixiga asub ta teele, et leida nutikas gall, kellele võlujoogi saladused edasi anda

programme.title: Erakordne harra Rogers
programme.desc: Sudamlik, biograafiline draama. Aastal 1998 saadetakse kuuniline akirjanik Lloyd Vogel intervjueerima legendaarset Ameerika lastesaatejuhti Fred Rogersit. Ajakirjanik leiab, et see ulesanne pole tema kaliibri vaariline ja laheb intervjuud tegema sooviga paljastada Rogers teeskluselt. Fred Rogers on aga tõepoolest heasudamlik ja siiras ning kohtumine temaga muudab Vogeli elu põhjalikult. R: Marielle Heller. O: Matthew Rhys, Tom Hanks, Susan Kelechi Watson, Chris Cooper. Ajakiri Time valis teose aasta kumne parima filmi hulka. Tom Hanks palvis oma rolliga Oscari ja Kuldgloobuse nominatsiooni.

programme.title: Hell baar
programme.desc: Long Islandil kasvav poiss otsib oma onu baarist isafiguure.

programme.title: Neetud naabrid
programme.desc: USA 2014 komoodia. Kelly ja Mac arvavad, et kolivad oma vastsundinud lapsega elama rahulikku keskkonda, ent siis kolivad naabermajja meeskorporatsiooni liikmed. Korporatsiooni president Teddy ja ta parem kasi Pete on varmalt nõus sõbrunema, kui Kelly ja Mac end naabritena tutvustavad. Ent peatselt peab noorpaar kutsuma politsei, et uued naabrid maha rahuneks, ning siis hakkavad asjad jubedalt viltu minema. Lavastaja:Nicholas Stoller Osades:Seth Rogen,Rose Byrne,Zac Efron

programme.title: Neetud naabrid 2
programme.desc: USA 2016 komoodia Lavastaja:Nicholas Stoller Osades:Seth Rogen, Zac Efron, Rose Byrne, Chlo? Grace Moretz, Ike Barinholtz Mac (Seth Rogen) ja Kelly (Rose Byrne) ootavad oma teist last ning otsustavad kolida. Nende plaani muudab aga keeruliseks Shelby (Chloe Grace Moretz), kes tahab luua naiskorporatsiooni, et koos sõpradega pidusid korraldada. Kaks seltskonda on peatselt sõjajalal, kuna suhtuvad larmakasse muusikasse ja ohjeldamatusse joomisse erinevalt. Varsti kutsuvad Mac ja Kelly appi oma endise vaenlase Teddy (Zac Efron), et Kappa Nu nende kodukandis rohkem segadust ei tekitaks.

programme.title: Luud ja muu
programme.desc: Noor naine laheb 1000-miilisele seiklusele labi Ameerika, kus ta kohtub vagabundist noormehega. Kuid kõik viib lõpuks tagasi nende hirmuaratavasse minevikku ja peab selguma, kas nende armastus suudab ellu jaada.

programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: 1. Bundesliga
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A couple are ready to leave Seattle and escape to Bainbridge Island. He wants a turnkey house close to the ferry, while she hopes for a big garden.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A family from Eastern Washington are moving to their favourite camping spot, Fidalgo Island. They need a house with lots of space for the kids to play.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. programme.title: Buying the Beach
programme.desc: Prospective home-buyers in the USA are shown exclusive properties nestled on the beachfront, giving them access to a personal oasis on their doorstep. The buyers are shown three dream properties before choosing their favourite. These spectacular properties are jaw-droppingly beautiful, providing families with the opportunity to open their doors and dip their toes in the sea. Paradise comes at a price though, and these exquisite homes do not come cheap. The show is part of the "Buying" franchise that also includes Buying Alaska, Buying the Bayou and Buying Hawaii.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.sub-title: Family Home Makeover Helps Tie the Knot
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Selling The Hamptons
programme.desc: In the high-stakes world of Hamptons real estate, the art of buying, selling, hustling, and schmoozing is all part of the game. But this is the Hamptons like weve never seen before. As life is slowly getting back to normal for most people around the world, life in the Hamptons is the busiest its ever been! And the Nest Seekers Team is in overdrive trying to adapt to a market that hasnt seen this type of demand... ever! As the weather heats up, so does the competition for these young brokers who want to prove that they can find success in the most exclusive real estate market in the country.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Egiptuse liiva all asub 24 tohutut sarkofaagi, mis kõik on tuhjad. Mis eesmarki võisid need hiiglaslikud hauakambrid taita? Ja kas on võimalik, et need taiuslikult nikerdatud kastid ei ole mitte inimeste, vaid maavaliste kulaliste poolt kujundatud?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui enamik inimesi otsib maavalist elu taevast, siis uks grupp uurijaid kaitub vastupidiselt - nad otsivad seda maa alt. Skinwalkeri rantšo Utah osariigis on kuulus paigana, kus on taheldatud sadu paranormaalseid ja UFO-dega seotud nahtusi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkond on saatnud satelliite kosmosesse ja allveelaevu ookeani põhja, kuid Maa pinna all olev ala on endiselt salaparane. Kas kivikihtide alla või tohututesse koobastesse on maetud sugavad saladused?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Egiptuse liiva all asub 24 tohutut sarkofaagi, mis kõik on tuhjad. Mis eesmarki võisid need hiiglaslikud hauakambrid taita? Ja kas on võimalik, et need taiuslikult nikerdatud kastid ei ole mitte inimeste, vaid maavaliste kulaliste poolt kujundatud?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Hollywoodi oksjonile ja kohtuvad uue konkurendiga, kellel on nailiselt lõputu rahavoog. Parast seda, kui nad avastavad kolme toruga pussi ja antiikse kaamelisadula, seisab Allen silmitsi vana lapsepõlvehirmuga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: New Orleansi reisil puuavad Ton ja Allen segada ari ja lõbu. Nad sõdivad kohalike elanikega karmil oksjonil, võidavad Mardi Gras konteineri, mis sisaldab konfetipuhurit ja moodsat kallioopet, ning lahevad siis linna peale.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad lahevad plahvatuslikuks, kui letile jõuab Jaapani Godzilla manguasi. Kas Corey valjub võitjana enne purustamist? Jargmisena laheb Chum lahingusse teise maailmasõja aegse nahkjaki parast - kuid kas tema pakkumine lõhkeb pommina?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Louisianas kohtuvad Ton ja Allen laevakastide oksjonil mõne pahura kohalikuga ning navigeerivad paatide oksjonil keerulistes vetes. Parast hulga raha kulutamist leiavad nad taktikalise plahvatuskaitse ja ahvenapuugi paadi.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kulastades Toni õde Missouri osariigis, kus nad kaivad raftingul ja lõõgastuvad, sattuvad nad tempokale live-oksjonile. Parast mõningaid kõvasid kaotusi saavad Ton ja Allen saagiks ballista ja alasi komplekti plahvatuslikuks spordiks.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Corey sõidavad klassikalise autoga Hells Chariot, mis on parit filmist "Grease". Kas leegitsev hot rod on see, mida nad tahavad, või "kukuvad" nad tehingust valja? Seejarel võtab Chum ette poksikotimangu, mida kunagi mangis Jack Dempsey.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Chum leiab 1920ndate aastate Baccarat pudeli Ybry parfuumi jaoks. Rick uurib pakendis "Spiderman ja Venom: Maximum Carnage" videomangu. Corey hindab 1800ndate aastate hasartmangukomplekti. Rick ja Corey uurivad Pearl Harbori runnaku automaatkahurit.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russell avastavad, et filmide maagia on vaid illusioon, kui nad uritavad vedada filmi esilinastuseks ikoonilist filmiautot, samal ajal kui Doug saab teada, et veepargi aeglane jõgi peaks kandma pisut teistsugust nime.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi saavad omale vaikese tooriistakomplekti. Barry jaab oksjonile hiljaks ja loob kampa uhe tagasihoidliku panustajaga. Mark Balelo lahkub oksjonilt suure printeriga, aga kas see toob talle ka suurt tulu?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barryle kukub Orangeis Californias kapp selga. Ivy Calvin sobrab prugis ja leiab nii mõndagi. Jarrod ja Brandi võidavad uhe lao, kuid kas nad ka teenivad selle pealt?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui klient tuleb poodi haruldase HG Wellsi raamatuga - ja astronoomilise hinnaga - kas Corey lendab siis tahtede poole? Seejarel aga ei ole lollitamist, kui pandimajja saabub turkiisist tehtud kuju. Kas see palvib Ricki heakskiidu või hukkamõistu?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Chum uritab anda endast parima, kui letile pannakse Nike Lebroni tossud. Kas tuleb pealtpanek? Seejarel jalgib Rick tahelepanelikult muujat, kes saabub signeeritud Pulp Fictioni plakatiga. Kas ta suudab valja kaubelda kuninglikult hea hinna?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Uustulnukad Rene ja Casey ostavad kuju, mis võib olla vaart tuhandeid dollareid. Darrell Sheets teeb kaslastega seotud avastusi ning Barry on tagasi koos kahe oksjoniingliga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Harrise vennad lahevad varjatud režiimile. Jarrod ja Brandi on heategevuslikul lainel. Barry leiab koti, mis viib ta suusatama. Darrell avastab suure posti.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kõige suurem mõistatus, millele puudub seni vastus, võib olla meie saatus parast surma. Ehk annavad vihjeid ebaharilikud surmalahedased juhtumid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Poodi jõuab Bruno Marsi plaatina-album. Kas Corey saab laheda diili või jaab ta labiraakimistest valja? Rick helistab Dennis Quaidile, et aidata tuvastada allkirjastatud plakatit. Kas Rick suudab olla hea suhtleja või suhtutakse temasse kulmalt?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas me oleme tõesti universumis uksi? Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud pakuvad valja, et kirjeldused taevastest jumalatest ja taheolenditest võivad kajastada tegelikke kohtumisi maavaliste kulalistega kauges minevikus. Kas see võib olla tõsi?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Vanaaegsete suusagondlite laadung viib Molly ja Russelli Vermonti magedest Colorado Kaljumaestikku, samal ajal kui Dougile antakse ulesanne toimetada ainulaadne majake uhte ikoonilisse Jellystonei parki.

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teooria usku Giorgio Tsoukalos jagab mõtteid hiiglaslike kivimoodustiste ja kummaliste hiidkujude kohta, mida tuntakse monoliitidena. Mis sundis iidseid inimesi ule maailma hiiglaslikke kive liigutama ja kivimonumente ehitama?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Meeskond kaivitab uskumatu oise 200 drooni valgusshow eksperimendi Kolmnurga ja Idavalja kohal, mille tulemuseks on ehmatav nahtus taevas ja uued andmed, mis viitavad võimalikele vastustele sugaval salaparase kunka sisemuses.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui poodi saabub muuja "Energiasamba" mutsiga, mis on tehtud ansambli DEVO jaoks, siis kas Ricki pakkumine on parim? Ja hiljem koidab Ricki George Washingtoni allkirjastatud kiri. Kuid kas kusitav hind paneb ta massu algatama?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Andy ja Paul lahevad uhele maailma suurimale iidsete indiaanlaste petrogluufide leiukohale ja avastavad, et selle kaljukunsti jõud võib põhjustada kõige veenvamaid tõendeid tundmatute nahtuste kohta, mida nad on kunagi registreerinud.

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Parast eksperimendi labiviimist, mis paljastab rohkem tõendeid uskumatute nahtuste kohta Skinwalkeri rantšo kohal taevas, saab meeskond teada, et kinnistu suurim saladus võib tegelikult asuda sugaval maa all.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Labi ajaloo on inimesed oma surnuid matnud. Kas meil on loomuparane vajadus oma minevikku valja kaevata? Mida me otsime ja millised sugavad saladused jaavad haudadesse peitu?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond avastab soos seni tundmatu konstruktsiooni, mis meenutab markimisvaarselt konteinerit. Ja parast nadalatepikkust Chappelli varakambri jahtimist avastab seltskond sugavalt Money Pitist tuhimiku.

programme.title: Uskumatu koos Dan Aykroydiga
programme.desc: Kas olete mõelnud, millised on kõige veidramad asjad, mis on taevast alla kukkunud? Alates meteoriitidest kuni mereandide ja isegi vannideni - need on mõned tõeliselt uskumatud lood sellest, mis on ulalt alla tulnud. Ei usu? Vaadake lihtsalt ules!

programme.title: Vanglakroonikad
programme.desc: Londoni kesklinnas Thamesi jõe aares asuv Tower on tuntud piinamiste ja peade mahaloomiste poolest ning tekitab õudusunenagusid. Algselt William Vallutaja poolt 1078. aastal kindluseks ehitatud hoonest sai 1101. aastal vangla.

programme.title: Vanglakroonikad
programme.desc: Nõukogude Gulagi susteemi esimese neljakumne tegevusaasta jooksul vangistati vahemalt 18 miljonit inimest ja ule pooleteise miljoni inimese suri. Gulag koosnes oma haripunktis ligi 500-st vangla rajoonist.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Labi ajaloo on paljud vaitnud, et nad suudavad tulevikku naha. Need mustikud, prohvetid ja selgeltnagijad said nagemusi sundmustest, mis muutsid ajaloo kulgu. Kuid mida nende ettekuulutused naitasid?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: 2021. aastal katkestas Ameerika Ühendriikide valitsus 70 aastat kestnud pretsedendi, mille kohaselt eitas UFOsid. Kas me avastame peagi, et need on tegelikult maavalise paritoluga?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Pandipoe ajalooga Ton ja Allen alustavad oma karjaari jargmist peatukki suure pauguga. Nad avastavad teise maailmasõja aegse tulirelva ja vene kosmonautide skafandri, mis võib olla nende seni suurim leid... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen lahevad vastamisi oma endise assistendi Carolyniga, samal ajal kui Ton võitleb seljavaluga. Mehed avastavad automaat-õhupussi ja kui labiraakimised trikirambi muumiseks lahevad halvasti, seisab Allen raske otsuse ees.

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Neli seppa asuvad toole sõna otseses mõttes mutrivõtmega, kui neil palutakse neist teha enda stiilis relvad. Finaalis tuleb neil teha uliharuldane kirve ja nuia hubriid, mida kutsutakse Tabar Shish-pariks.

programme.title: Pandikunnid

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Hiiglaslik kirikutorn paneb Natashat kahtlema oma usus kahveltõstukisse, samal ajal kui Dwighti ja Tyesha jaoks saabub talv koos kuningliku veoga, mis koosneb kasitsi valmistatud troonist ja hiiglaslikust kuningakoogist.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Vanaaegsete suusagondlite laadung viib Molly ja Russelli Vermonti magedest Colorado Kaljumaestikku, samal ajal kui Dougile antakse ulesanne toimetada ainulaadne majake uhte ikoonilisse Jellystonei parki.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Talismanid pakuvad kaitset ja õnne. Mõne puhul arvatakse isegi, et need kehastavad kõrgemat jõudu. Kas võib olla, et see, mis toidab meie usku talismanidesse, ei ole ebausk, vaid tõeline side millegagi valjaspool meie maailma?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle maailma on hiiglaslikke monoliite, mida meie esivanemad raiusid tugevast kivist. Mis oli nende monumentide eesmark? Kas neil oli mingi rituaalne funktsioon? Kas need olid mõeldud jumalate austamiseks? Või olid nad mõeldud energia juhtimiseks?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Corey on lummatud maagiliste malestusesemete kollektsioonist, Rick uurib haruldast "Roheliste viilkatuste Annei" eksemplari ja uks vana Harley t-sark paneb Corey hulluma, enne kui Rick ja Chum suunduvad Californiasse Disney kollektsiooni vaatama.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Samal ajal, kui meeskond puuab peatada vee voolamist aiašahti, suvenevad Oak Islandi, kapten Phippsi ja templiruutlite vahelised seosed 5. platsil kiiresti.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Uuringud on naidanud, et kuni 70% kõigist UFO-de nagemisest toimub nn "lemmikpaikades", kus on regulaarselt teateid nagemuste, salaparaste tulede ja ebatavaliste nahtuste kohta - ja seda mitte ainult tanapaeval, vaid juba tuhandeid aastaid tagasi.

programme.title: Uskumatu koos Dan Aykroydiga
programme.desc: Kas olete mõelnud, millised on kõige veidramad asjad, mis on taevast alla kukkunud? Alates meteoriitidest kuni mereandide ja isegi vannideni - need on mõned tõeliselt uskumatud lood sellest, mis on ulalt alla tulnud. Ei usu? Vaadake lihtsalt ules!

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Tuhanded inimesed vannuvad, et on kohanud seda legendaarset Põhja-Ameerika olendit, kuid ametlikult ei ole Suurjalga kunagi tuvastatud. Mõistatus pusib: kas Suurjalg on tõesti olemas? Ja kui jah, siis kes - ja kus - see on?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Kaubad, mida traditsioonilised toovõtjad transportida ei suuda, ei ole selle tõsielusaate osalejatele takistuseks. Veokijuhid võistlevad omavahel, kes saab jagu suurimast valjakutsest – toimetada kõige keerulisem veos punktist A punkti B. Pole vahet, kas see kaalub mitu tonni, võtab enda alla mitu liiklusrada, mureneb, puruneb või on elus! Kõige olulisem on kliendi rahulolu ja teenuse kiirus.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha saavad eluspartide ja kanade karja uude koju vedamise ajal teada, miks farmiloomad ei ole alati head teekaaslased. Ja kuigi Tamara sulised semud on luigekujulised aerupaadid, seisab ka tema silmitsi taltsutamatu koormaga.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud

programme.desc: Labi ajaloo on paljud vaitnud, et nad suudavad tulevikku naha. Need mustikud, prohvetid ja selgeltnagijad said nagemusi sundmustest, mis muutsid ajaloo kulgu. Kuid mida nende ettekuulutused naitasid?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy viib oma lapsed Victorvillei "rannapaevale" ja nad võtavad sellest maksimumi. Brandi uritab kustutada halbu telkimismalestusi hea laoboksi abil. Hoolimata sellest, et Rene hurjutab teda ta valikute tõttu, õnnestub Kennyl saada korralik tulu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laura viibib omaette Moreno Valleys ja ta pole selle põhjuste osas eriti salatsev. Brandi teenib kena kasumi. Rene nukukapist leiab paar ullatust, samas kui Ivy tegeleb pisut uleloomulike asjadega.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Spencer satub poodi isuaratavate uute leidudega, kuid kas Rick võtab vedu? Siis kohtuvad Chum ja Rick mustkunstnikuga, kes muub siksak-triki kasti. Kas nad võluvad tehingu valja? Corey satub segadusse vanadest muntidest valmistatud kaelakee parast.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas need salaparased paigad võivad kinnitada iidseid legende maa-alustest maailmadest, kus elavad maavalised olendid? Ja kui see on tõesti nii, siis millised muud maavalised saladused võivad meie jalge all peituda?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Tuhanded inimesed vannuvad, et on kohanud seda legendaarset Põhja-Ameerika olendit, kuid ametlikult ei ole Suurjalga kunagi tuvastatud. Mõistatus pusib: kas Suurjalg on tõesti olemas? Ja kui jah, siis kes - ja kus - see on?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Üle maailma on hiiglaslikke monoliite, mida meie esivanemad raiusid tugevast kivist. Mis oli nende monumentide eesmark? Kas neil oli mingi rituaalne funktsioon? Kas need olid mõeldud jumalate austamiseks? Või olid nad mõeldud energia juhtimiseks?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy viib oma lapsed Victorvillei "rannapaevale" ja nad võtavad sellest maksimumi. Brandi uritab kustutada halbu telkimismalestusi hea laoboksi abil. Hoolimata sellest, et Rene hurjutab teda ta valikute tõttu, õnnestub Kennyl saada korralik tulu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laura viibib omaette Moreno Valleys ja ta pole selle põhjuste osas eriti salatsev. Brandi teenib kena kasumi. Rene nukukapist leiab paar ullatust, samas kui Ivy tegeleb pisut uleloomulike asjadega.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Vennaskond jatkab pingutusi soos ja leiab kohe hammastavaid tõendeid sellest, et Oak Islandil liigutati sajandeid tagasi suurt lasti.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laooksjonid on kõige uuem ja suurem avastamata viis otsida kadunud aardeid. Auahned inimesed teevad panuseid mahajaetud varale, lootes sattuda kullasoonele. Tere tulemast lahingutesse ladude parast!

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Pandipoe ajalooga Ton ja Allen alustavad oma karjaari jargmist peatukki suure pauguga. Nad avastavad teise maailmasõja aegse tulirelva ja vene kosmonautide skafandri, mis võib olla nende seni suurim leid... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen lahevad vastamisi oma endise assistendi Carolyniga, samal ajal kui Ton võitleb seljavaluga. Mehed avastavad automaat-õhupussi ja kui labiraakimised trikirambi muumiseks lahevad halvasti, seisab Allen raske otsuse ees.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Spencer satub poodi isuaratavate uute leidudega, kuid kas Rick võtab vedu? Siis kohtuvad Chum ja Rick mustkunstnikuga, kes muub siksak-triki kasti. Kas nad võluvad tehingu valja? Corey satub segadusse vanadest muntidest valmistatud kaelakee parast.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans

With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Egiptuses on tehtud ajaloo suurimaid arheoloogilisi leide, alates Sfinksi mõistatustest ja muumiatest kuni puramiidideni. Kuid millisel saladusel on olnud kõige suurem mõju meie nagemusele muistsest Egiptusest?

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Kui meeskond laheneb tunnelile, mis võib olla aardelaburindi osa, saab Bingo teada, et osa diktaator Ferdinand Marcose varandusest võidi Yamashita aarde seast varastada. Ta paljastab võimaliku seose CIA vandenõuga.

programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi is determined to disprove the theories of the so-called pyramidiots, who believe that there are secret underground chambers leading to the Sphinx. Little did anyone know that these caves were home to thousands of bats!

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Endine USA merevae radarioperaator ilmub valja ja raagib kohutavast paevast, mil UFO-sid taevast alla sadas. USA merevae tootajad paljastavad uusi andmeid, millest selgub ka see, miks UFO-sid tihti ookeani kohal nahakse.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: WW2 Treasure Hunters is a television programme that looks at a whole range of historical artefacts and all the untold stories, of the conflict . In unearthing forgotten stories, you gain a real understanding of the biggest modern war in military history. Militia experts, survivors and historians, this show merges all of these important figures together so you can gain a real understanding of WW2. Starring Stephen Taylor, Ben Major and amateur relic hunter, Suggs, it creates a real personal attachment between the viewer and the presenters. Detecting, reflecting and dissecting stories, this talented threesome explain using experts and survivors the true detrimental effects of WW2. With most of the artefacts being found in the UK, you will gain a true historical knowledge of the Blitz.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Endine USA merevae radarioperaator ilmub valja ja raagib kohutavast paevast, mil UFO-sid taevast alla sadas. USA merevae tootajad paljastavad uusi andmeid, millest selgub ka see, miks UFO-sid tihti ookeani kohal nahakse.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: WW2 Treasure Hunters is a television programme that looks at a whole range of historical artefacts and all the untold stories, of the conflict . In unearthing forgotten stories, you gain a real understanding of the biggest modern war in military history. Militia experts, survivors and historians, this show merges all of these important figures together so you can gain a real understanding of WW2. Starring Stephen Taylor, Ben Major and amateur relic hunter, Suggs, it creates a real personal attachment between the viewer and the presenters. Detecting, reflecting and dissecting stories, this talented threesome explain using experts and survivors the true detrimental effects of WW2. With most of the artefacts being found in the UK, you will gain a true historical knowledge of the Blitz.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi is determined to disprove the theories of the so-called pyramidiots, who believe that there are secret underground chambers leading to the Sphinx. Little did anyone know that these caves were home to thousands of bats!

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Tundmatu
programme.desc: Endine USA merevae radarioperaator ilmub valja ja raagib kohutavast paevast, mil UFO-sid taevast alla sadas. USA merevae tootajad paljastavad uusi andmeid, millest selgub ka see, miks UFO-sid tihti ookeani kohal nahakse.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: WW2 Treasure Hunters is a television programme that looks at a whole range of historical artefacts and all the untold stories, of the conflict . Militia experts, survivors and historians, this show merges all of these important figures together so you can gain a real understanding of WW2. Detecting, reflecting and dissecting stories, this talented threesome explain using experts and survivors the true detrimental effects of WW2. With most of the artefacts being found in the UK, you will gain a true historical knowledge of the Blitz.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: The Who
programme.sub-title: The Who: Live At the Isle Of Wight Festival
programme.desc: In 2004 The Who returned to the Isle Of Wight Festival for the first time since their legendary performance in 1970. After a long absence, the festival had been reborn in 2002 and continues to this day. Their UK concerts in 2004 were the first in their home country since the death of founder member John Entwistle. As the evening shadows lengthened across the festival site, The Who took to the stage and delivered an incendiary performance packed with hit singles and classic album tracks and the concert more than lived up to the fans expectations and memories of 1970.

programme.desc: James Todd Smith III, best known by the stage name of LL Cool J, is an American hip-hop artist and actor. He is best known for his romantic ballads

programme.desc: Main Square Festival is a music festival that takes place in Arras, France, lasting three days.

programme.title: Chic _ Live in London
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Blur was formed in the late 1980s when all four members were attending Londons Goldsmiths College. However lead signer Damon Albarn and guitarist Graham Coxon had actually known each other since childhood, growing up together in Colchester. With bassist Alex James and drummer Dave Rowntree, the band began playing under the name of Seymour, after a character created by J D Salinger, but they soon changed that to Blur to secure a deal with Food Records. After their debut Shes So High failed to trouble the top of the charts, Blur teamed up with producer Stephen Street. They had immediate success with the single Theres No Other Way. Upon its release, Blurs debut album, Leisure, failed to make the impact Food Records had hoped for but the band had a musical turning point with the release of the single Popscene. It had a distinctly English sound and is often credited as being the very first Britpop song. Blur decided to take on a quintessentially English style and image for their second album, Modern Life is Rubbish. By hanging on to their newfound English heritage, commercial fortunes would change for Blur in 1994 with the release of the single Girls and Boys. The success of Girls and Boys propelled the bands third album, Parklife, to enter the charts at number one.

programme.title: Guns N Roses - Live From the O2 Arena London
programme.desc: Watch this mega-production of Guns N Roses performing live at the O2 Arena to its fans singing and vibrating to each song. Includes; Paradise City, Sweet Child O Mine, November Rain and many more.

programme.title: Ben Howard - Live at the Launch Pad
programme.desc: Ben Howard works through a dramatic set in Austin TX, starting humble and concluding in a cataclysmic storm of drums, snapping guitar strings, and a delirious crowd taking it all in.

programme.title: Peter Gabriel - Peter Gabriel

programme.title: Leon Bridges - Apple Music Festival​
programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: Vance Joy - In Session
programme.desc: Vance Joy takes a solo stroll through a couple of wondrous little tunes from his debut album, Dream Your Life Away.

programme.title: Ozzy Osbourne _ God Bless Ozzy Osbourne
programme.desc: Ozzy Osbourne is one of the most iconic figures in rock and one of the founding fathers of heavy metal. ""God Bless Ozzy Osbourne"" tells for the first time the story of his career from the founding of Black Sabbath through to solo stardom and his wider fame beyond. These were the wild days of his prodigious drug and alcohol intake, of biting the head from a dove at a record company meeting and biting into a bat on stage but also of the tragic death of Randy Rhoads and the reality TV show The Osbournes. The film follows Ozzys torturous and emotionally fraught journey from excess to sobriety, which Ozzy regards as his greatest accomplishment. Featuring never before seen footage, new interviews with Ozzy himself, his family, his bandmates, and those who both inspired him and were inspired by him, this is the first film to take viewers inside the mind and psyche of this legendary figure.

programme.title: Alabama Shakes - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: Mixing classic RandB vocals with a soulful blues-rock base, Alabama Shakes have taken garage rock and turned it on its head. Alabama Shakes takes the Austin City Limits stage for the second time in support of their newest album Sound and Color.

programme.title: Lady Gaga _ Live in London
programme.desc: Lady Gagas performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstars first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura"; "MANiCURE"; "Artpop"; "Jewels N Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista; "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine"; and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that shes "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Evanescence - Synthesis Live
programme.desc: In 2003, Evanescence released Fallen, one of the most decade-defining albums (and one of the most successful debut albums of all time) and have gone on to became one of the most well-loved and respected bands of their generation. In the 15 years since their debut, Evanescence founder and lead-singer, Amy Lee, toured the world, has scored motion picture films and even took a 3 year break to start a family. In late 2017, Evanescence re-emerged from their hiatus with Synthesis—a reimagining of their best-known songs with orchestra and electronics and an accompanying sold-out and highly-acclaimed world tour. On November 3, 2017 Evanescence performed "Synthesis Live" in front of a sold out crowd at the Grand Theater at Foxwoods Casino in CT.

programme.title: Paul McCartney _ A MusiCaresTribute
programme.desc: On February 10, 2012, Sir Paul McCartney was honored as the 2012 MusiCares® Person of the Year. At a gala event in Los Angeles, Paul and a cast of superstar guests performed some of the quintessential songs from his renowned and celebrated career. Proceeds from the sale of this product will provide essential support for MusiCares, which ensures that music people have a place to turn in times of financial, medical and personal need.

programme.title: Jake Bugg - Live at Hype Machines Hype Hotel
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old British singer-songwriter Jake Bugg is a man of few words, that is until he begins his strumming. His unique voice is one that finds few, yet highly admirable comparisons - perhaps a rockabilly-folk twangy twist of The Mountain Goats John Darnielle and Colin Meloy of the Decemberists. The release of his self-titled, full-length debut last October sent a sonic shockwave through the music world with songs like the feverishly hooking foot-pounder "Lightning Bolt" and the howling 60s rock sing-along "Two Fingers". Jake took the stage late one evening at Hype Machines Hype Hotel, where he roared through his catalog of catchy hits for an rock-hungry crowd. And we were there to catch the solid solo kid in action.

programme.title: Motley Crue _ The End
programme.sub-title: Motley Crue _ The End: Live In Los Angeles
programme.desc: On January 28, 2014, Motley Crue held a press conference at Beachers Madhouse Theater in Hollywood, where they announced a final tour. The band became the first to sign a binding legal document known as a "cessation of touring" contract, preventing them from touring under the name Motley Crue past the year 2015. The tour eventually ended with three nights at the Staples Center in the bands hometown of Los Angeles on December 28, 30 and 31st of 2015. The visually stunning and final concert of Motley Crues final tour, Motley Crue: The End was captured with 30 cameras in Ultra HD 4K in front of a sold out crowd of die hard Motley Crue fans. For all of the legion of fans who were not able to experience the final concert of one of the greatest rock bands of all time, this is the ultimate chance to see the show and relive the final tour of Motley Crue.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Michael Jackson American singer, songwriter, dancer and simply the King of Pop. His contributions to music, dance, and publicized personal life made him a global figure in popular culture for over four decades. Jackson made his professional debut in 1964 as a member of The Jackson 5, soon becoming a dominant figure in popular music. His music videos, "Beat It"", "Billie Jean"", and "Thriller"" are credited with breaking racism in the USA and transforming the medium into an art form. Thriller is the best-selling album of all time. Jackson was the most awarded recording artist in the history of popular music. Aspects of Jacksons personal life generated controversy and while preparing for his comeback concert series, This Is It, Jackson died of acute Propofol and Benzodiazepine intoxication on June 25, 2009, after suffering from cardiac arrest. The Los Angeles County Department of Medical Examiner Coroner ruled his death a homicide, and his personal physician, Conrad Murray.
